panels.description: Show the number of pods running in the namespace
panels.title: Current Pods Count

panels.description: Show the count of containers in  Waiting, and Terminated statuses.

targets.expr: sum by(exported_namespace)(kube_pod_container_status_terminated_reason{cluster=~"$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace", reason!="Completed"} == 1)  OR on() vector(0)
sum by(exported_namespace)(kube_pod_container_status_terminated_reason{cluster=~"$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace", reason="Completed"} == 1)  OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Container status (Namespace)

panels.description: Shows the last time of pod deployed
panels.title: Last Deployment Time

targets.expr:
sum((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod", phase="Failed"} * 2) or (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod", phase="Pending"} * 4) or
(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod", phase="Running"} * 8) or 
(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod", phase="Succeeded"} * 16) or 
(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod", phase="Unknown"} * 32)) by (exported_pod)

panels.description: Show information about the reason the container is currently in waiting or terminated state
panels.title: Not healthy pods (Namespace)

panels.description: Shows memory usage per container in pod against resource requests and limits

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD", container!="", image=~".*"}) by (container)

panels.title: Memory Usage $pod

panels.description: Shows memory quota usage by pod

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!~"", pod=~"$pod", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod"}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!~"", pod=~"$pod", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!~"", image!=""}) by (image, container)

panels.title: Memory Quota $pod

panels.description: Shows CPU usage per container in pod against resource requests and limits

targets.expr:
sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container)(
rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!~"", name!="", image!=""}[2m]))) by (pod,container)

panels.title: CPU Usage $pod

panels.description: Shows CPU quota usage by pod

targets.expr: sum(sum by (namespace, container, name) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!~"", name!=""}[5m]))) by (container)

sum(sum by (namespace, container, name) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!~"^(.*POD.*|)$", name!=""}[5m]))) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster",  exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod", container!~"", resource="cpu"}) by (container)

sum(sum by (namespace, container, name) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!~"", name!=""}[5m]))) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$pod"}) by (container)
sum(sum by (namespace, container, image) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!~"", name!=""}[5m]))) by (container, image)

panels.title: CPU Quota $pod
